original_text: Only they would that we should remember the poor; the same which I also was forward to do.
korean_text: 다만 우리에게 가난한 자들을 기억하도록 부탁하였으니 이것은 나도 본래부터 힘써 행하여 왔노라

sentences.original_text: Only they would that we should remember the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리가 가난한 자들을 기억하기를 원했습니다

sentences.original_text: the same which I also was forward to do
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 또한 앞장서서 하려 했던 바로 그것입니다
